item.title: More wild ways to destroy a hurricaneâ€¦
item.dc:creator: Brian Kirsten
item.content:encoded: Amateur hurricane-busters have come up with any number of crackpot ideas to spare Florida from ferocious storms. Among them: blowing hurricanes away with giant fans or blowing them up with nuclear warheads. (Link courtesy of Fark)
item.excerpt:encoded: Amateur hurricane-busters have come up with any number of crackpot ideas to spare Florida from ferocious storms. Among them: blowing hurricanes away with giant fans or blowing them up with nuclear warheads. (Link courtesy of Fark)
